summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of AI Agent Builder platform UI overhaul. Successfully tested new Flows section, Flow Builder with React Flow, updated Integrations page, improved Knowledge page with stats cards, enhanced sidebar with Pro Plan upgrade, and user profile dropdown. All major features working correctly with minor navigation issue identified.

ui_bugs.issue: Navigation to Flow Builder after creating new flow fails - stays on flows page instead of redirecting to builder
ui_bugs.workaround: Users can manually navigate to Flow Builder via Edit button on existing flows

design_issues.issue: Dropdown remains open after clicking outside - body click handler not working properly

passed_tests: ✅ NEW: Flows page in sidebar navigation - working correctly
✅ NEW: Flows list page with 3 mock flow cards displayed properly
✅ NEW: Create Flow modal opens and accepts input correctly
✅ NEW: Flow Builder page with React Flow visual canvas - fully functional
✅ NEW: Flow Builder node palette with 13 draggable nodes and categories
✅ NEW: Drag and drop functionality working in Flow Builder
✅ NEW: Node category filtering (All, Triggers, AI & LLM, Voice, Actions, Logic, Integrations)
✅ NEW: Integrations page with connected integrations section (4 active)
✅ NEW: Integrations page with 24 category cards properly displayed
✅ UPDATED: Knowledge page with 3 stats cards at top (Knowledge Bases, Total Documents, Active Bases)
✅ UPDATED: Knowledge page with improved icons and layout
✅ UPDATED: Sidebar with improved icons, descriptions, and section grouping (Build, Manage, Monitor)
✅ UPDATED: Sidebar with Pro Plan upgrade card at bottom
✅ UPDATED: Top navbar with user profile dropdown (Profile, Settings, Sign out options)
✅ Navigation between all pages working correctly
✅ Responsive design and glass-card styling consistent across pages
✅ React Flow toolbar with Save, Test Flow, Undo, Redo, Zoom controls
✅ Flow Builder back navigation to Flows page working
✅ Search functionality on Flows, Integrations, and Knowledge pages
✅ Mock data integration working properly for demo purposes
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Create Flow modal navigation - the 'Create & Open Editor' button should redirect to Flow Builder page after creating a new flow, currently it stays on the flows page. Also fix user profile dropdown click-outside behavior.
